page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Some people will go to the cinema for entertainment, other people would go to clubs and discos. People have diffrent ways to be entitained like just sitting at home listening to the radio or watching television, or going to the theatre. Some people even read books to entitain themselves. I entitain myself by reading books or make model aircraft kits or doing jigsaw puzzles. Most teenagers might go the arcaids. They mite even go and watch a pop group or a local band in the aera. Some people mite fansy going to watch a football or rugby match near by. Maybe they would like to a sports centere to play a sport for some sort of enterainment.
Paul Brien
